name: BoomBear TNT
description:
BOOM!
The bear just woke from a long and hard winter and had no idea what to expect when we stepped outside the cave this year!

over 90 awesome levels action packed with tricky tasks and big TNT explosions!

This is truly an amazing puzzle adventure game where you should plan well,
blow some boxes, bounce the bear of the crates and use rubber tyres to bash his way onto the high voltage plate on every level,
Once he stays there - BOOOOM! zap his furry butt with high voltage!

One high voltage shot on every level is required in order to move on to the next level.

Do you have what it takes to complete all levels and smoke him all the way to the final?
